remarks: The class of all weak universes.  A weak universe is a nonempty transitive class closed under union, pairing, and powerset.  The advantage of a weak universe over a Grothendieck universe is that weak universes satisfy the analogue ~ uniwun of ~ grothtsk in ZFC (whereas ~ grothtsk requires ~ ax-groth ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-wun $p |- WUni = { u | ( Tr u /\ u =/= (/) /\ A. x e. u ( U. x e. u /\ ~P x e. u /\ A. y e. u { x , y } e. u ) ) } $.
$d u x y $.
